trans-unit.source: Manages a compact array of bit values, which are represented as Booleans, where <see langword="true" /> indicates that the bit is on (1) and <see langword="false" /> indicates the bit is off (0).
trans-unit.target: 管理位值的压缩数组，这些值以布尔值的形式表示，其中 <see langword="true" /> 表示此位为开 (1)，<see langword="false" /> 表示此位为关 (0)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.BitArray> class is a collection class in which the capacity is always the same as the count.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.BitArray>类是一个集合类，在其中容量是始终计数相同。

trans-unit.source: Elements are added to a <xref:System.Collections.BitArray> by increasing the <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Length%2A> property; elements are deleted by decreasing the <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Length%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 元素添加到<xref:System.Collections.BitArray>通过增加<xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Length%2A>属性; 通过降低删除元素<xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Length%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The size of a <xref:System.Collections.BitArray> is controlled by the client; indexing past the end of the <xref:System.Collections.BitArray> throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.The <xref:System.Collections.BitArray> class provides methods that are not found in other collections, including those that allow multiple elements to be modified at once using a filter, such as <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.And%2A>, <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Or%2A>, <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Xor%2A> , <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Not%2A>, and <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.SetAll%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 大小<xref:System.Collections.BitArray>由客户端控制; 索引的末尾<xref:System.Collections.BitArray>引发<xref:System.ArgumentException>。<xref:System.Collections.BitArray>类提供了其他集合，包括允许同时使用筛选器，如修改多个元素中找不到的方法<xref:System.Collections.BitArray.And%2A>， <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Or%2A>， <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Xor%2A> ， <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Not%2A>，和<xref:System.Collections.BitArray.SetAll%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32> class is a structure that provides the same functionality as <xref:System.Collections.BitArray>, but with faster performance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32>类是一个结构，它提供与相同的功能<xref:System.Collections.BitArray>，但具有更快的性能。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32> is faster because it is a value type and therefore allocated on the stack, whereas <xref:System.Collections.BitArray> is a reference type and, therefore, allocated on the heap.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32> 速度更快，因为它是值类型，因此在堆栈上分配，而<xref:System.Collections.BitArray>是引用类型，因此，在堆上分配。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32?displayProperty=nameWithType> can store exactly 32 bits, whereas <xref:System.Collections.BitArray> can store a variable number of bits.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32?displayProperty=nameWithType> 可以存储完全 32 位，而<xref:System.Collections.BitArray>可以存储可变数量的位。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32> stores both bit flags and small integers, thereby making it ideal for data that is not exposed to the user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32> 位标志和小整数，从而使其适合不公开的数据对用户的存储。

trans-unit.source: However, if the number of required bit flags is unknown, is variable, or is greater than 32, use <xref:System.Collections.BitArray> instead.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果所需的位标志的数未知，是变量，或大于 32，使用<xref:System.Collections.BitArray>相反。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.BitArray> is in the <xref:System.Collections> namespace; <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32> is in the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized> namespace.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.BitArray> 处于<xref:System.Collections>命名空间;<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32>处于<xref:System.Collections.Specialized>命名空间。

trans-unit.source: Elements in this collection can be accessed using an integer index.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用整数索引访问此集合中的元素。

trans-unit.source: Indexes in this collection are zero-based.
trans-unit.target: 在此集合中的索引是从零开始。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create and initialize a <xref:System.Collections.BitArray> and how to print out its values.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建和初始化<xref:System.Collections.BitArray>以及如何打印出其值。

trans-unit.source: Public static (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic) members of this type are thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 公共静态 (<see langword="Shared" />在 Visual Basic 中) 的此类型的成员都是线程安全。

trans-unit.source: Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 但不保证所有实例成员都是线程安全的。

trans-unit.source: This implementation does not provide a synchronized (thread safe) wrapper for a <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" />.
trans-unit.target: 此实现不提供同步 （线程安全） 包装器<see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" />。

trans-unit.source: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> class whose capacity and initial values can be specified.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> 类的新实例，可指定该实例的容量和初始值。

trans-unit.source: An array of Booleans to copy.
trans-unit.target: 要复制的布尔值数组。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> class that contains bit values copied from the specified array of Booleans.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> 类的新实例，该实例包含从布尔值指定数组复制的位值。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the number of elements in `values`.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数是 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是中的元素数`values`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="values" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="values" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An array of bytes containing the values to copy, where each byte represents eight consecutive bits.
trans-unit.target: 字节数组包含要复制的值，此处每个字节代表八个连续位。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> class that contains bit values copied from the specified array of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> 类的新实例，该实例包含从指定的字节数组复制的位值。

trans-unit.source: The first byte in the array represents bits 0 through 7, the second byte represents bits 8 through 15, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 数组中的第一个字节表示 0 到 7 位，第二个字节表示 bits 8 到 15，以此类推。

trans-unit.source: The Least Significant Bit of each byte represents the lowest index value: " `bytes` [0] & 1" represents bit 0, " `bytes` [0] & 2" represents bit 1, " `bytes` [0] & 4" represents bit 2, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 每个字节最高有效位表示最小索引值:" `bytes` [0] & 1" 表示位 0，" `bytes` [0] （& a) 2" 表示位 1，" `bytes` [0] & 4" 表示位 2，依次类推。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the number of elements in `bytes`.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数是 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是中的元素数`bytes`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="bytes" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="bytes" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The length of <paramref name="bytes" /> is greater than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="bytes" /> 的长度大于 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> to copy.
trans-unit.target: 要复制的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> class that contains bit values copied from the specified <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" />.
trans-unit.target: 初始化包含从指定 <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> 复制的位值的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the number of elements in `bits`.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数是 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是中的元素数`bits`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="bits" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="bits" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The number of bit values in the new <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" />.
trans-unit.target: 新 <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> 中位值的数目。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> class that can hold the specified number of bit values, which are initially set to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> 类的新实例，该实例可拥有指定数目的位值，位值最初设置为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `length`.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数是 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是`length`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="length" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="length" /> 小于零。

trans-unit.source: An array of integers containing the values to copy, where each integer represents 32 consecutive bits.
trans-unit.target: 包含要复制的值的整数数组，在这里每个整数都表示 32 个连续位。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> class that contains bit values copied from the specified array of 32-bit integers.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> 类的新实例，该类包含从指定的 32 位整数数组复制的位值。

trans-unit.source: The number in the first `values` array element represents bits 0 through 31, the second number in the array represents bits 32 through 63, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 在第一个数`values`数组元素表示 0 到 31 位，数组中的第二个数字表示 32 到 63 位，依次类推。

trans-unit.source: The Least Significant Bit of each integer represents the lowest index value: " `values` [0] & 1" represents bit 0, " `values` [0] & 2" represents bit 1, " `values` [0] & 4" represents bit 2, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 每个整数的最高有效位表示最小索引值:" `values` [0] & 1" 表示位 0，" `values` [0] （& a) 2" 表示位 1，" `values` [0] & 4" 表示位 2，依次类推。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the number of elements in `values`.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数是 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是中的元素数`values`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="values" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="values" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The length of <paramref name="values" /> is greater than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="values" /> 的长度大于 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />

trans-unit.source: The number of bit values in the new <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" />.
trans-unit.target: 新 <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> 中位值的数目。

trans-unit.source: The Boolean value to assign to each bit.
trans-unit.target: 要赋值给每个位的布尔值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> class that can hold the specified number of bit values, which are initially set to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> 类的新实例，此实例可以容纳指定数量的位值，并且将其初始值设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `length`.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数是 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是`length`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="length" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="length" /> 小于零。

trans-unit.source: The array with which to perform the bitwise AND operation.
trans-unit.target: 要与其执行按位“与”运算的数组。

trans-unit.source: Performs the bitwise AND operation between the elements of the current <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> object and the corresponding elements in the specified array.
trans-unit.target: 在当前 <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> 对象中的元素和指定数组中的相应元素之间执行按位“与”运算。

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> object will be modified to store the result of the bitwise AND operation.
trans-unit.target: 将修改当前 <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> 对象，以存储按位“与”运算的结果。

trans-unit.source: An array containing the result of the bitwise AND operation, which is a reference to the current <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 包含按位“与”运算结果的数组，此数组是对当前 <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> 对象的引用。

trans-unit.source: The bitwise AND operation returns `true` if both operands are `true`, and returns `false` if one or both operands are `false`.
trans-unit.target: 按位与运算返回`true`如果这两个操作数都是`true`，并返回`false`如果一个或两个操作数都是`false`。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是<xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Count%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to perform the bitwise AND operation between two <xref:System.Collections.BitArray> objects.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何执行两个按位与运算<xref:System.Collections.BitArray>对象。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> and the current <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> do not have the same number of elements.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 和当前 <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> 不具有相同数量的元素。

trans-unit.source: Creates a shallow copy of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> 的浅表副本。

trans-unit.source: A shallow copy of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> 的浅表副本。

trans-unit.source: A shallow copy of a collection copies only the elements of the collection, whether they are reference types or value types, but it does not copy the objects that the references refer to.
trans-unit.target: 集合的浅表副本复制仅的元素集合，不论它们是引用类型还是值类型，但它不会复制引用所引用的对象。

trans-unit.source: The references in the new collection point to the same objects that the references in the original collection point to.
trans-unit.target: 新集合中的引用都指向原始集合中的引用指向同一对象。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, a deep copy of a collection copies the elements and everything directly or indirectly referenced by the elements.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反，集合的深层副本复制这些元素，以及由这些元素直接或间接引用的所有内容。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是<xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Count%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that is the destination of the elements copied from <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" />.
trans-unit.target: 一维 <see cref="T:System.Array" />，它是从 <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> 复制的元素的目标。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Array" /> must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 必须具有从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in <c>array</c> at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: <c>array</c> 中从零开始的索引，在此处开始复制。

trans-unit.source: Copies the entire <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> to a compatible one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" />, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: 从目标数组的指定索引处开始将整个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> 复制到兼容的一维 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: The specified array must be of a compatible type.
trans-unit.target: 指定的数组必须具有兼容类型。

trans-unit.source: Only `bool`, `int`, and `byte` types of arrays are supported.
trans-unit.target: 仅`bool`， `int`，和`byte`支持类型的数组。

trans-unit.source: This method uses <xref:System.Array.Copy%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to copy the elements.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用<xref:System.Array.Copy%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>要复制的元素。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是<xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Count%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to copy a <xref:System.Collections.BitArray> into a one-dimensional <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何复制<xref:System.Collections.BitArray>到一维<xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小于零。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 是多维的。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the source <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> is greater than the available space from <paramref name="index" /> to the end of the destination <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: 源 <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> 中的元素个数大于从 <paramref name="index" /> 到目标 <paramref name="array" /> 末尾之间的可用空间。

trans-unit.source: The type of the source <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> cannot be cast automatically to the type of the destination <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: 无法自动将源 <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> 的类型转换为目标 <paramref name="array" /> 的类型。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of elements contained in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> 中包含的元素数。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements contained in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> 中包含的元素数。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Length%2A> and <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Count%2A> return the same value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Length%2A> 和<xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Count%2A>返回相同的值。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Length%2A> can be set to a specific value, but <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Count%2A> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Length%2A> 可以将设置为特定值，但<xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Count%2A>是只读的。

trans-unit.source: Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the value to get.
trans-unit.target: 要获取的值的从零开始索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the bit at a specific position in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> 中特定位置处的位的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the bit at position <paramref name="index" />.
trans-unit.target: 在 <paramref name="index" /> 位置处的位的值。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 o （1） 运算。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to set and get specific elements in a <xref:System.Collections.BitArray>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何设置和获取特定元素中<xref:System.Collections.BitArray>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小于零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is greater than or equal to the number of elements in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 大于或等于 <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> 中的元素数。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回循环访问 <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> 的枚举数。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> for the entire <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" />.
trans-unit.target: 用于整个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" />。

trans-unit.source: The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators.
trans-unit.target: C# 语言的 `foreach` 语句（在 Visual Basic 中为 `for each`）隐藏了枚举数的复杂性。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator.
trans-unit.target: 因此，建议使用 `foreach`，而不是直接操作枚举数。

trans-unit.source: Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。

trans-unit.source: Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> also brings the enumerator back to this position.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> 也会将枚举器放回此位置。

trans-unit.source: At this position, <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 在此位置上，未定义 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you must call <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，在读取 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> 的值之前，必须调用 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> 将枚举器向前移动到集合的第一个元素。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> returns the same object until either <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: 在调用 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> 或 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> 之前，<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> 返回同一对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> sets <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> to the next element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> 将 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> 设置为下一个元素。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>越过的末尾的集合，枚举数定位在集合中的最后一个元素的后面和<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> also return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 当枚举器位于此位置上，后续调用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>还返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: If the last call to <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> returned `false`, <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果最后一次调用到<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>返回`false`，<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>是不确定的。

trans-unit.source: To set <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> to the first element of the collection again, you can call <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> followed by <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要再次将 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> 设置为集合的第一个元素，可以调用 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> 并接着调用 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>。

trans-unit.source: An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 只要集合保持不变，枚举数就保持有效。

trans-unit.source: If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果对集合进行更改（如添加、修改或删除元素），则枚举数将失效且不可恢复，而且其行为是不确定的。

trans-unit.source: The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 枚举数没有对集合的独占访问权；因此，从头到尾对一个集合进行枚举在本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。

trans-unit.source: To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization.
trans-unit.target: 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 o （1） 运算。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> 是否为只读。

trans-unit.source: This property is always <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 此属性恒为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.BitArray> implements the <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.IsReadOnly%2A> property because it is required by the <xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.BitArray> 实现<xref:System.Collections.BitArray.IsReadOnly%2A>属性因为它必需的<xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=nameWithType>接口。

trans-unit.source: A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created.
trans-unit.target: 在创建只读集合后，该集合不允许添加、移除或修改元素。

trans-unit.source: A collection that is read-only is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents modifying the collection; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, the read-only collection reflects those changes.
trans-unit.target: 集合是只读的是只是一个集合与防止集合; 进行修改的包装因此，如果对基础集合进行更改，只读集合将反映这些更改。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 o （1） 运算。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否同步对 <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> 的访问（线程安全）。

trans-unit.source: This property is always <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 此属性恒为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.BitArray> implements the <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.IsSynchronized%2A> property because it is required by the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.BitArray> 实现<xref:System.Collections.BitArray.IsSynchronized%2A>属性因为它必需的<xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=nameWithType>接口。

trans-unit.source: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.SyncRoot%2A> during the entire enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何锁定集合使用<xref:System.Collections.BitArray.SyncRoot%2A>在整个枚举期间。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 o （1） 运算。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the value to get or set.
trans-unit.target: 要获取或设置的值的从零开始索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the bit at a specific position in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> 中特定位置的位的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the bit at position <paramref name="index" />.
trans-unit.target: 在 <paramref name="index" /> 位置处的位的值。

trans-unit.source: This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: `myCollection[index]`.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用下面的语法通过此属性访问集合中的特定元素：`myCollection[index]`。

trans-unit.source: The C# language uses the keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Item%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: C# 语言使用关键字进行定义而不是实现索引器<xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Item%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Visual Basic implements <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Item%2A> as a default property, which provides the same indexing functionality.
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic 将 <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Item%2A> 实现为默认属性，该属性提供相同的索引功能。

trans-unit.source: Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation; setting the property is also an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 检索此属性的值的运算 o （1）;设置属性也是 o （1） 运算。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小于零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is equal to or greater than <see cref="P:System.Collections.BitArray.Count" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 等于或大于 <see cref="P:System.Collections.BitArray.Count" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of elements in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> 中元素的数目。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> 中的元素的数量。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Length%2A> and <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Count%2A> return the same value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Length%2A> 和<xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Count%2A>返回相同的值。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Length%2A> can be set to a specific value, but <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Count%2A> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Length%2A> 可以将设置为特定值，但<xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Count%2A>是只读的。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Length%2A> is set to a value that is less than <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Count%2A>, the <xref:System.Collections.BitArray> is truncated and the elements after the index `value` -1 are deleted.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Length%2A>设置一个值，是为小于<xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Count%2A>、<xref:System.Collections.BitArray>截断和索引之后的元素`value`-1 将被删除。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Length%2A> is set to a value that is greater than <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Count%2A>, the new elements are set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Length%2A>设置为一个值，大于<xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Count%2A>，则新的元素设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property is an O(`n`) operation.
trans-unit.target: 将此属性设置为 O (`n`) 操作。

trans-unit.source: The property is set to a value that is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: 该属性已设置为一个小于零的值。

trans-unit.source: Inverts all the bit values in the current <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" />, so that elements set to <see langword="true" /> are changed to <see langword="false" />, and elements set to <see langword="false" /> are changed to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 反转当前 <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> 中的所有位值，以便将设置为 <see langword="true" /> 的元素更改为 <see langword="false" />；将设置为 <see langword="false" /> 的元素更改为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The current instance with inverted bit values.
trans-unit.target: 具有已反转的位值的当前实例。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是<xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Count%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to apply NOT to a <xref:System.Collections.BitArray>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何将 NOT 应用于<xref:System.Collections.BitArray>。

trans-unit.source: The array with which to perform the bitwise OR operation.
trans-unit.target: 要用其执行按位“或”运算的数组。

trans-unit.source: Performs the bitwise OR operation between the elements of the current <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> object and the corresponding elements in the specified array.
trans-unit.target: 在当前 <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> 对象中的元素和指定数组中的相应元素间执行按位“或”运算。

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> object will be modified to store the result of the bitwise OR operation.
trans-unit.target: 将修改当前 <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> 对象，以存储按位“或”运算的结果。

trans-unit.source: An array containing the result of the bitwise OR operation, which is a reference to the current <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 包含按位“或”运算结果的数组，此数组是对当前 <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> 对象的引用。

trans-unit.source: The bitwise OR operation returns `true` if one or both operands are `true`, and returns `false` if both operands are `false`.
trans-unit.target: 按位或运算返回`true`如果一个或两个操作数都是`true`，并返回`false`如果这两个操作数都是`false`。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是<xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Count%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to perform the OR operation between two <xref:System.Collections.BitArray> objects.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何执行两个或运算<xref:System.Collections.BitArray>对象。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> and the current <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> do not have the same number of elements.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 和当前 <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> 不具有相同数量的元素。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the bit to set.
trans-unit.target: 要设置的位的从零开始索引。

trans-unit.source: The Boolean value to assign to the bit.
trans-unit.target: 要分配给比特位的布尔值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the bit at a specific position in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> 中特定位置处的位设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 o （1） 运算。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to set and get specific elements in a <xref:System.Collections.BitArray>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何设置和获取特定元素中<xref:System.Collections.BitArray>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小于零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is greater than or equal to the number of elements in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 大于或等于 <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> 中的元素数。

trans-unit.source: The Boolean value to assign to all bits.
trans-unit.target: 要分配给所有位的布尔值。

trans-unit.source: Sets all bits in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> 中的所有位设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是<xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Count%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to set and get specific elements in a <xref:System.Collections.BitArray>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何设置和获取特定元素中<xref:System.Collections.BitArray>。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取可用于同步对 <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> 的访问的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" />.
trans-unit.target: 可用于同步对 <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> 的访问的对象。

trans-unit.source: Derived classes can provide their own synchronized version of the <xref:System.Collections.BitArray> using the <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.SyncRoot%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 派生的类可以提供自己的同步的版本<xref:System.Collections.BitArray>使用<xref:System.Collections.BitArray.SyncRoot%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The synchronizing code must perform operations on the <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.SyncRoot%2A> of the <xref:System.Collections.BitArray>, not directly on the <xref:System.Collections.BitArray>.
trans-unit.target: 同步代码必须在执行操作<xref:System.Collections.BitArray.SyncRoot%2A>的<xref:System.Collections.BitArray>，而不是直接在<xref:System.Collections.BitArray>。

trans-unit.source: This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects.
trans-unit.target: 这样可确保对从其他对象派生的集合正确地执行操作。

trans-unit.source: Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the <xref:System.Collections.BitArray> object.
trans-unit.target: 具体地说，这样可保持正确的同步，与可能同时对修改其他线程<xref:System.Collections.BitArray>对象。

trans-unit.source: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.SyncRoot%2A> during the entire enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何锁定集合使用<xref:System.Collections.BitArray.SyncRoot%2A>在整个枚举期间。

trans-unit.source: Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。

trans-unit.source: The array with which to perform the bitwise exclusive OR operation.
trans-unit.target: 用其执行按位“异或”运算的数组。

trans-unit.source: Performs the bitwise exclusive OR operation between the elements of the current <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> object against the corresponding elements in the specified array.
trans-unit.target: 针对指定数组中的相应元素，在当前 <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> 对象中的元素间执行按位“异或”运算。

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> object will be modified to store the result of the bitwise exclusive OR operation.
trans-unit.target: 将修改当前 <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> 对象，以存储按位“异或”运算的结果。

trans-unit.source: An array containing the result of the bitwise exclusive OR operation, which is a reference to the current <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 包含按位“异或”运算的结果的数组，此数组是对当前 <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> 对象的引用。

trans-unit.source: The bitwise exclusive OR operation returns `true` if exactly one operand is `true`, and returns `false` if both operands have the same Boolean value.
trans-unit.target: 位异或运算返回`true`如果恰好一个操作数是`true`，并返回`false`如果两个操作数具有相同的布尔值。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is <xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是<xref:System.Collections.BitArray.Count%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to perform the XOR operation between two <xref:System.Collections.BitArray> objects.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何执行两个 XOR 运算<xref:System.Collections.BitArray>对象。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> and the current <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> do not have the same number of elements.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 和当前 <see cref="T:System.Collections.BitArray" /> 不具有相同数量的元素。
